description: Detects the creation or modification of the Windows Terminal Profile settings file "settings.json" by an uncommon process.
author: frack113
Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
false_positives: Some false positives may occur with admin scripts that set WT settings.
name: Windows Terminal Profile Settings Modification By Uncommon Process
query: (process.executable:(/.*\\\\[Cc][Mm][Dd]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\\\[Cc][Ss][Cc][Rr][Ii][Pp][Tt]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\\\[Mm][Ss][Hh][Tt][Aa]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\\\[Pp][Oo][Ww][Ee][Rr][Ss][Hh][Ee][Ll][Ll]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\\\[Pp][Ww][Ss][Hh]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\\\[Ww][Ss][Cc][Rr][Ii][Pp][Tt]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/) AND file.path:/.*\\\\[Aa][Pp][Pp][Dd][Aa][Tt][Aa]\\\\[Ll][Oo][Cc][Aa][Ll]\\\\[Pp][Aa][Cc][Kk][Aa][Gg][Ee][Ss]\\\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\.[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss][Tt][Ee][Rr][Mm][Ii][Nn][Aa][Ll]_8[Ww][Ee][Kk][Yy][Bb]3[Dd]8[Bb][Bb][Ww][Ee]\\\\[Ll][Oo][Cc][Aa][Ll][Ss][Tt][Aa][Tt][Ee]\\\\[Ss][Ee][Tt][Tt][Ii][Nn][Gg][Ss]\.[Jj][Ss][Oo][Nn]/)
